Body: Using Yahoo e-mail, I wanted to send pictures and videos taken on my phone.It's worked in the past but does not now. The videos were short (less than 30 seconds), but now all it does is circulate. The videos (11 MB) never work and the pictures (3 MB) rarely do, no matter how long I let it circulate.  Posting on Facebook used to be a way to get around it, but now most pictures won't download and no videos will.  There's got to be a way around this because pictures and videos used to routinely download on Facebook.
Title: Downloading videos from phone to yahoo and facebook

The videos were short (less than 30 seconds), but now all it does is circulate. The videos (11 MB) never work and the pictures (3 MB) rarely do, no matter how long I let it circulate.  Posting on facebook used to be a way to get around it, but now most pictures won't download and no videos will.  There's got to be a way around this because pictures and videos used to routinely dowload on facebook. Help!
Downloading videos from phone to yahoo and facebook

Using Yahoo e-mail, I wanted to send pictures and videos taken on my phone.  It's worked in the past but does not now. The videos were short (less than 30 seconds), but now all it does is circulate. The videos (11 MB) never work and the pictures (3 MB) rarely do, no matter how long I let it circulate.  Posting on Facebook used to be a way to get around it, but now most pictures won't download and no videos will.  There's got to be a way around this because pictures and videos used to routinely download on Facebook.
